entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
